favoriteMovies.overview: Po is gearing up to become the spiritual leader of his Valley of Peace, but also needs someone to take his place as Dragon Warrior. As such, he will train a new kung fu practitioner for the spot and will encounter a villain called the Chameleon who conjures villains from the past.
favoriteMovies.title: Kung Fu Panda 4

favoriteMovies.original_title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
